titles.title: Congratulating the McLennan Community College Highlanders men's golf team for winning the 2010 NJCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

bill.summary: 6/14/2010--Introduced. Congratulates the McLennan Community College Highlanders men's golf team on winning the 2010 NJCAA Division I Men's Golf Championship.
